bike.description: Full high modulus carbon main frame, stays and bell crank, Omniad M30 lay-up, 100mm travel mp4 linkage design, Press Fit 30 bottom bracket, 12 x 142 rear thru-axle dropouts, SST size-specific tube diameters, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chain stay protector, cartridge bearing pivots, Fox Float CTD (3 position) shock with Boost Valve and 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Maxle rear axle

components.description: Fox 32 Float 29 CTD (3 position) with 15mm thru-axle, tapered alloy steerer, external rebound, 32mm stanchions, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
WTB Frequency Race i19 TCS 29" tubeless rims with Shimano SLX centerlock 15mm front & 12x142 rear hubs, stainless spokes & brass nipples
Shimano SLX rear and Shimano Deore 34.9mm dual pull front
Ritchey Pro 2B OS, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp
Shimano M596 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear RT54 centerlock rotors
